summary: Gives Sofie, the orphan in Windhelm, snow-covered clothes
descriptionHtml:
Requires Hearthfire and Dragonborn

Just a little mod that gives Sofie, the poor little orphaned flower seller in Windhelm, the snow covered clothes that Aeta, the Skaal child, wears. It makes her look like she\'s really been living a sad life on the cold, snowy streets of Windhelm. Makes you pity her more.

It adds. Trust me.
author: AuroraFrostNinja
